quagga.input.subject: Re: Porter & Hedges
quagga.input.body:
I don't know anyone over there well enough to recommend them, so my interest 
is low. However, I have no objection.




Robert C Williams@ENRON_DEVELOPMENT
04/27/2000 12:03 PM
To: Stephanie Harris@ENRON_DEVELOPMENT, Rob 
Walls/ENRON_DEVELOPMENT@ENRON_DEVELOPMENT, Richard Sanders
cc:  
Subject: Porter & Hedges

Are we interested in adding Porter & Hedges to our list of approved 
litigation counsel?  Mark Glatzer of that firm has called me and requested a 
meeting or lunch.  I don't want to encourage him if there's no hope.
